abstract: How to stop action on inequality, climate, and more.
snippet: How to stop action on inequality, climate, and more.
lead_paragraph: Columbia Journalism Review has a takedown of a "study" from American Enterprise Institute purporting to show that inequality hasn't increased, after all. What's striking is the way AEI doesn't even resort to the usual practice of concocting misleading numbers; it just flat-out lies about what various other peoples' research, like Robert Gordon's work, actually says.
